org.expressme.webwind.guice
Interface ServletContextAware

public interface ServletContextAware

Guice module which implements this interface will automatically get the ServletContext object in web application.

Author:
Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com)

Method Summary
 void setServletContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
          Called by GuiceContainerFactory when initialize module.
